item.title: Put a pin in it
item.description: üìå Signal’s latest update introduces a pinning feature for important messages in chats! Users can now pin up to 3 messages in both 1-1 and group conversations, making it easier to keep track of key information like dinner plans or itineraries. Admins can manage who can pin messages, and pinned items can stay for 24 hours to forever. Join the Signal beta program to test new features and provide feedback! #SignalUpdate #MessagingApp #TechNews #PinnedMessages #ChatFeatures

item.title: Introducing Signal Secure Backups
item.description: üì± Signal has introduced secure backups, addressing a long-standing user request. This new opt-in feature allows users to back up their message history, ensuring important conversations are not lost if a phone is damaged or lost. Currently available in beta for Android, it will soon roll out to iOS and Desktop. Secure backups are end-to-end encrypted and refresh daily for added security. #Signal #SecureBackups #Privacy #Messaging #TechUpdates
